title: New Player Looking To Join Team.
body:
Hi, spilo here.
I'm fairly new to League and want to try to get picked up and have some fun with a coordinated team.
I'm trying to jungle but can also play mid. I want to play fizz, nidalee, rengar, zed, maybe some other stuff. Leveling my account right now so most of these champs aren't unlocked haha. 
I'm also currently unranked, so if you're looking for someone to teach and help improve, all while hopefully beating other teams and climbing ranks then message me on discord @ spilo#0911. 
Thank you!
:)

replies.body:
Go to the NA Boards... we're sick of all you Americans being unable to read which Board you're on!

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
